original_text: I will stop your covenant with death. Your agreement with Sheol will not continue. When trouble comes like a deep flood of water, it will drown you. I will stop your covenant with death. Your agreement with Sheol will not continue. When trouble comes like a deep flood of water, it will drown you.
korean_text: 너희가 사망과 더불어 세운 언약이 폐하며 스올과 더불어 맺은 맹약이 서지 못하여 넘치는 재앙이 밀려올 때에 너희가 그것에게 밟힘을 당할 것이라

sentences.original_text: I will stop your covenant with death.
Your agreement with Sheol will not continue.
sentences.korean_translation: 스올과의 너희 약속은 계속되지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: When trouble comes like a deep flood of water,
sentences.korean_translation: 환난이 깊은 물의 홍수처럼 올 때,
